TopicTitle: Crashing in Latest Stable and Pre-Release

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm having some issues that seem to have started from no where.

When running either the latest stable release or or the pre-release after about 5 mins the screen will flicker, the desktop show but the game will still be in focus.  After this I have to force close the game via task manager.  No crash log is generated.

I don't get an issue with any other games and I'm lost as to what's casing it...

 

EDIT:  This is 32 & 64bit

System Specs;

Intel i5 OC to 4.4 (Have tried without O/C)

R9 270x 4GB

Edited October 2, 2016 by daveo132

Hi @daveo132, even without a crash log there is still a lot of information in the KSP.log in the KSP folder and the output_log.txt in the KSP_Data folder, plus your dxdiag hardware report (run from the start menu)

Please put all of these on a file share site such as dropbox (accounts are free) and post the share link here, thank you

Hi @sal_vager,

Output and Dxdiag are in my google drive.  Link below

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByQfVeRavhy6Tjd6N1I3RnBHV1U

Edited October 6, 2016 by daveo132

I may have fixed this.  For whatever reason the way the GPU was being powered was no longer good enough.  Haven't touched it for months.  Anyway ran a new cable for the second input off the PSU and don't seem to have any more issues.
